snippet: Gay rights advocates say that the bill is a signal of societal acceptance of discrimination that will likely be picked up by violent antigay groups.
abstract: Russian Parliament passes bill that imposes fine for what it calls propagandizing 'nontraditional' sexual relationships among minors, latest in wave of socially conservative new rules; bill does not clarify meaning of 'nontraditional' but intent is clearly to discourage open discussion of homosexuality.
lead_paragraph: Gay rights advocates say that the bill is a signal of societal acceptance of discrimination that will likely be picked up by violent antigay groups.

headline.main: Russia Passes Bill Targeting Some Discussions of Homosexuality
headline.print_headline: Russia Passes Bill Targeting Some Discussions of Homosexuality

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
